message: I think that Tech Sites should have the same type of articles like this
story: Ahmed Adel shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Robert Fisk: Our addiction to the internet is as harmful as any drug – and what passes for...
caption: independent.co.uk
description: Something is rotten in the state of technology. I only realised the extent of this when I wrote last year about an Irish government minister who had committed suicide just before Christmas 2012, partly because – according to his brother at the graveside – he had received so many abusive messages on…
